abstract: When Ara Starck and David Jarre met, she was a painter, he a magician. Now they are a band, soon to perform in New York City.
snippet: When Ara Starck and David Jarre met, she was a painter, he a magician. Now they are a band, soon to perform in New York City.
lead_paragraph: When they met in Paris she called herself a painter and he called himself a magician. She had just come from New York and was working on a series of portraits. He'd been touring the south of France doing a show of tricks with coins, cards and cigarettes. They dated and they broke up and then they started the band, the Two.
